page.title: 11FARMING IN CARLTON
page.content: In our area there are{two}farms.{Mr {Scott's}and{Mr Farnsworth's.}Their farms are{divided}by the{border}of the {two counties}of{Nottinghamshire}and {Yorkshire. Mr Farnsworth's}farm has the most land.He owns{500}acres.{Mr {Scott}has{390 acres.Mr Scott}is an {arable}farmer,but he lets his neigh- bour graze{125}sheep on his land.{Mr {Farnsworth's }farm is a{mixed}farm.he keeps{beef cattle. Mr Scott}grows {wheat,oil seed rape, peas, potatoes and{barley. Mr Farnsworth}grows{oil {seed rape,wheat, peas,winter wheat}and {potatoes.}The land is{200}feet above {sea level.Mr Farnsworth}and{Mr Scott grow mostly{wheat.}They both grow the amount of{potatoes}that the{Government allows them to produce this year.This is{25 acres.Mr Scott}uses{potato {pickers}from{Dinnington}to pick his {potatoes.
